CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 9 reads: "Homemakers See Latest in Foods, Appliances...8. Edward Trower and daughter, Cecelia, furnished shopping bags for the Home Fair visitors. The Trower Tailoring Company's three stores feature better cleaning for less...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: J. Edward Trower and Cecelia Trower (Epperson), in Trower Tailoring Company display booth, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
